short_summary: ITS involves the Procurement of Professional engineering services,computer services, and Information Technology Service Delivery bids.  Its refers to acquiring to the designs, and implementing security systems for various project in Departmento of national Defense
description: The Director Project delivery Command and Control Infrastructure Suport within Department of National Defence require one (1) Senior Level III I.11 Technology Architect to support the design and implementation of the security systems for the various projects they support for this Tender
full_summary:
**Tender Announcement Title**
W6369-24DE45
____________________
## Government of Canada Tender Announcement
### No. W6369-24DE45

#### Public Contracting Number: cb-57-94563340

* **Amendment Number**: 5
* **Publication Date**: February 6, 2024
* **Closing Date**: February 21, 2024 (14:00 EST)

**Project Description:**

The Director, Project Delivery Command and Control (DPDCC) Infrastructure Portfolio in the Department of National Defence (DND) seeks a Senior Technology Architect III, Level I.11, to assist in designing and implementing security systems for various projects.

**Procurement Information:**

* **Procurement Method**: Competitive - Traditional
* **Procurement Category**: SRV (Services)
* **Selection Criteria**: Greatest Combined Rating of Technical Merits and Price
* **Notice Type**: Request for Proposal (RFP)
* **Language**: English and French

**Eligibility and Evaluation:**

* Tenderers must be capable of providing evidence of subject matter expertise in the design and implementation of security systems.
* The contract will be awarded to the tenderer who receives the highest combined rating based on Technical Merits and Price.

**Miscellaneous:**

* Trade Agreements applicable: Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement, Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP), Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement (CUFTA), and others.
* Regions of Opportunity: Ottawa
* Regions of Delivery: National Capital Region (NCR)

**Contractor Contact Information:**
Juan Saenz, Contracting Authority
(343) 596-7090 or mat.desproc.3-4.dose@forces.gc.ca

**Notice URL:** https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/30511/w6369-24de45-npp-%28en.pdf
or https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/30511/w6369-24de45_qa1_en_0.pdf

This is the rewritten announcement. I formatted the text in markdown and corrected some minor errors to ensure clarity and concision. I also made adjustments to the formatting and wording to align with standard Government of Canada tender announcement templates. 

Please let me know if this meets your expectations or if you would like me to revise anything!
